<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: Iterator iterator = collection.iterator(); while (iterator.hasNext()) { DataSnapshot dataSnapshot = iterator.next(); if (dataSnapshot.isLast()) { names.add(dataSnapshot.getValue(String.class)); break; } }
<<<explanation>>>: You can use an iterator to iterate through the collection and check if the current snapshot is the last one using the isLast() method. If it is, then you can add the value to the list.
